verses.verse: וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' heard הַכְּנַעֲנִ֤י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni the Canaanite מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- And [when] king עֲרָד֙ <WH6166> 'a-Rad Arad יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> yo-Shev which dwelt הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> han-Ne-gev, in the south כִּ֚י <WH3588> ki for בָּ֣א <WH935> ba came יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, tell that Israel דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech by the way הָאֲתָרִ֑ים <WH871> ha-'a-ta-Rim; of the spies וַיִּלָּ֙חֶם֙ <WH3898> vai-yil-La-chem then he fought בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, against Israel וַיִּ֥שְׁבְּ׀ <WH7617> vai-Yishb and took מִמֶּ֖נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu some שֶֽׁבִי׃ <WH7628> She-vi. [some] of them prisoners

וַיִּדַּ֨ר <WH5087> vai-yid-Dar vowed יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El And Israel נֶ֛דֶר <WH5088> Ne-der a vow לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar; and said אִם־ <WH518> 'im- If נָתֹ֨ן <WH5414> na-Ton If thou wilt indeed תִּתֵּ֜ן <WH5414> tit-Ten deliver אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> ha-'Am this people הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh this בְּיָדִ֔י <WH3027> be-ya-Di, into my hand וְהַֽחֲרַמְתִּ֖י <WH2763> ve-ha-cha-ram-Ti then I will utterly destroy אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עָרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5892> 'a-rei-Hem. their cities

וַיִּשְׁמַ֨ע <WH8085> vai-yish-Ma' hearkened יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol to the voice יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and delivered up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni, the Canaanites וַיַּחֲרֵ֥ם <WH2763> vai-ya-cha-Rem and they utterly destroyed אֶתְהֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Hem וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עָרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH5892> 'a-rei-Hem; them and their cities וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra and he called שֵׁם־ <WH8034> shem- the name הַמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom of the place חָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> cha-re-Mah. Hormah פ Peh

וַיִּסְע֞וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they journeyed מֵהֹ֤ר <WH2023> me-Hor Hor הָהָר֙ <WH2022> ha-Har from mount דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech by the way יַם־ <WH3220> yam- sea ס֔וּף <WH5488> Suf, of the Red לִסְבֹ֖ב <WH5437> lis-Vo to compass אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land אֱד֑וֹם <WH123> e-Dom; of Edom וַתִּקְצַ֥ר <WH7114> vat-tik-Tzar was much discouraged נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> ne-fesh- and the soul הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> ha-'Am of the people בַּדָּֽרֶךְ׃ <WH1870> bad-Da-rech. because of the way

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, And the people בֵּֽאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> be-lo-Him against God וּבְמֹשֶׁה֒ <WH4872> u-ve-mo-Sheh and against Moses לָמָ֤ה <WH4100> la-Mah Why הֶֽעֱלִיתֻ֙נוּ֙ <WH5927> he-'e-li-Tu-nu Wherefore have ye brought us up מִמִּצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim, out of Egypt לָמ֖וּת <WH4191> la-Mut to die בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; desert כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein is no לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> le-chem bread וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> ve-'Ein and no מַ֔יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, neither [is there any] water וְנַפְשֵׁ֣נוּ <WH5315> ve-naf-She-nu and our soul קָ֔צָה <WH6973> Ka-tzah, loatheth בַּלֶּ֖חֶם <WH3899> bal-Le-chem food הַקְּלֹקֵֽל׃ <WH7052> hak-ke-lo-Kel. this light

וַיְשַׁלַּ֨ח <WH7971> vay-shal-Lach sent יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD בָּעָ֗ם <WH5971> ba-'Am, among the people אֵ֚ת <WH853> 'et הַנְּחָשִׁ֣ים <WH5175> han-ne-cha-Shim serpents הַשְּׂרָפִ֔ים <WH8314> has-se-ra-Fim, fiery וַֽיְנַשְּׁכ֖וּ <WH5391> vay-nash-she-Chu and they bit אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> ha-'Am; the people וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> vai-Ya-mot died עַם־ <WH5971> 'am- people רָ֖ב <WH7227> rav and much מִיִּשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> mi-Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> ha-'Am Therefore the people אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh to Moses וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru and said חָטָ֗אנוּ <WH2398> cha-Ta-nu, We have sinned כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- because דִבַּ֤רְנוּ <WH1696> dib-Bar-nu for we have spoken בַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh against the LORD וָבָ֔ךְ va-Vach, הִתְפַּלֵּל֙ <WH6419> hit-pal-Lel and against thee pray אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- with יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, unto the LORD וְיָסֵ֥ר <WH5493> ve-ya-Ser that he take away מֵעָלֵ֖ינוּ <WH5921> me-'a-Lei-nu and אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַנָּחָ֑שׁ <WH5175> han-na-Chash; the serpents וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> vai-yit-pal-Lel prayed מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh from us And Moses בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> be-'Ad for הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> ha-'Am. for the people

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses עֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH6213> 'a-Seh Make לְךָ֙ le-Cha שָׂרָ֔ף <WH8314> sa-Raf, thee a fiery serpent וְשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> ve-Sim and set אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on נֵ֑ס <WH5251> Nes; it upon a pole וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah shall come כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- everyone הַנָּשׁ֔וּךְ <WH5391> han-na-Shuch, and it shall come to pass that every one that is bitten וְרָאָ֥ה <WH7200> ve-ra-'Ah when he looketh אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To וָחָֽי׃ <WH2425> va-Chai. upon it shall live

וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as made מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses נְחַ֣שׁ <WH5175> ne-Chash a serpent נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> ne-Cho-shet, of brass וַיְשִׂמֵ֖הוּ <WH7760> vay-si-Me-hu and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַנֵּ֑ס <WH5251> han-Nes; it upon a pole וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah, came אִם־ <WH518> 'im- if נָשַׁ֤ךְ <WH5391> na-Shach had bitten הַנָּחָשׁ֙ <WH5175> han-na-Chash and it came to pass that if a serpent אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish, any man וְהִבִּ֛יט <WH5027> ve-hib-Bit when he beheld אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about נְחַ֥שׁ <WH5175> ne-Chash the serpent הַנְּחֹ֖שֶׁת <WH5178> han-ne-Cho-shet of brass וָחָֽי׃ <WH2425> va-Chai. he lived

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U set forward בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּאֹבֹֽת׃ <WH88> be-'o-Vot. in Oboth

וַיִּסְע֖וּ <WH5265> vai-yis-'U And they journeyed מֵאֹבֹ֑ת <WH88> me-'o-Vot; from Oboth וַֽיַּחֲנ֞וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּעִיֵּ֣י be-'i-Yei הָֽעֲבָרִ֗ים <WH5863> ha-'a-va-Rim, at Ijeabarim בַּמִּדְבָּר֙ <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar in the wilderness אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- is פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei which [is] before מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, Moab מִמִּזְרַ֖ח <WH4217> mi-miz-Rach east side הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> hash-Sha-mesh. east side

מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> mish-Sham there נָסָ֑עוּ <WH5265> na-Sa-'u; From thence they removed וַֽיַּחֲנ֖וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu and pitched בְּנַ֥חַל <WH5158> be-Na-chal in the valley זָֽרֶד׃ <WH2218> Za-red. of Zared

מִשָּׁם֮ <WH8033> mish-Sham there נָסָעוּ֒ <WH5265> na-sa-'U From thence they removed וַֽיַּחֲנ֗וּ <WH2583> vai-ya-cha-Nu, and pitched מֵעֵ֤בֶר <WH5676> me-'E-ver on the other side אַרְנוֹן֙ <WH769> 'ar-nOn of Arnon אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar, which [is] in the wilderness הַיֹּצֵ֖א <WH3318> hai-yo-Tze that cometh out מִגְּב֣וּל <WH1366> mig-ge-Vul of the coasts הָֽאֱמֹרִ֑י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri; of the Amorites כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for אַרְנוֹן֙ <WH769> 'ar-nOn for Arnon גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> ge-Vul [is] the border מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between מוֹאָ֖ב <WH4124> mo-'Av between Moab וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> u-Vein between הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri. and the Amorites

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> ken it יֵֽאָמַ֔ר <WH559> ye-'a-Mar, Wherefore it is said בְּסֵ֖פֶר <WH5612> be-Se-fer in the book מִלְחֲמֹ֣ת <WH4421> mil-cha-Mot of the wars יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- וָהֵ֣ב <WH2052> va-Hev What he did בְּסוּפָ֔ה <WH5492> be-su-Fah, in the Red sea וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַנְּחָלִ֖ים <WH5158> han-ne-cha-Lim and in the brooks אַרְנֽוֹן׃ <WH769> ar-Non. of Arnon

וְאֶ֙שֶׁד֙ <WH793> ve-'E-shed And at the stream הַנְּחָלִ֔ים <WH5158> han-ne-cha-Lim, of the brooks אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher that נָטָ֖ה <WH5186> na-Tah that goeth down לְשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> le-She-vet to the dwelling עָ֑ר <WH6144> 'Ar; of Ar וְנִשְׁעַ֖ן <WH8172> ve-nish-'An and lieth לִגְב֥וּל <WH1366> lig-Vul upon the border מוֹאָֽב׃ <WH4124> mo-'Av. of Moab

וּמִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> u-mish-Sham there בְּאֵ֑רָה <WH876> be-'E-rah; And from thence [they went] to Beer הִ֣וא <WH1931> hi that הַבְּאֵ֗ר <WH875> hab-be-'Er, that [is] the well אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher where אָמַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar spake יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh whereof the LORD לְמֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> le-mo-Sheh, unto Moses אֱסֹף֙ <WH622> 'e-Sof together אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, the people וְאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> ve-'et-te-Nah and I will give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. them water ס sa-Mek

אָ֚ז <WH227> 'az Then יָשִׁ֣יר <WH7891> ya-Shir sang יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, Then Israel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַשִּׁירָ֖ה <WH7892> hash-shi-Rah this song הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz-Zot; likewise עֲלִ֥י <WH5927> 'a-Li Spring up בְאֵ֖ר <WH875> ve-'Er O well עֱנוּ־ <WH6030> 'e-nu- sing לָֽהּ׃ Lah.

בְּאֵ֞ר <WH875> be-'Er the well חֲפָר֣וּהָ <WH2658> cha-fa-Ru-ha digged שָׂרִ֗ים <WH8269> sa-Rim, The princes כָּר֙וּהָ֙ <WH3738> ka-Ru-ha digged נְדִיבֵ֣י <WH5081> ne-di-Vei the nobles הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, of the people בִּמְחֹקֵ֖ק <WH2710> bim-cho-Kek it by [the direction of] the lawgiver בְּמִשְׁעֲנֹתָ֑ם <WH4938> be-mish-'a-no-Tam; with their staves וּמִמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> u-mi-mid-Bar And from the wilderness מַתָּנָֽה׃ <WH4980> mat-ta-Nah. [they went] to Mattanah

וּמִמַּתָּנָ֖ה <WH4980> u-mi-mat-ta-Nah And from Mattanah נַחֲלִיאֵ֑ל <WH5160> na-cha-li-'El; to Nahaliel וּמִנַּחֲלִיאֵ֖ל <WH5160> u-min-na-cha-li-'El and from Nahaliel בָּמֽוֹת׃ <WH1120> ba-Mot. to Bamoth

וּמִבָּמ֗וֹת <WH1120> u-mib-ba-Mot, And from Bamoth הַגַּיְא֙ <WH1516> hag-gaY [in] the valley אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> 'a-Sher is in בִּשְׂדֵ֣ה <WH7704> bis-Deh that [is] in the country מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> mo-'Av, of Moab רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> rosh to the top הַפִּסְגָּ֑ה <WH6449> hap-pis-Gah; of Pisgah וְנִשְׁקָ֖פָה <WH8259> ve-nish-Ka-fah which looketh עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei toward הַיְשִׁימֹֽן׃ <WH3452> hay-shi-Mon. Jeshimon פ Peh

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> vai-yish-Lach sent יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El And Israel מַלְאָכִ֔ים <WH4397> mal-'a-Chim, messengers אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to סִיחֹ֥ן <WH5511> si-Chon unto Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> ha-'e-mo-Ri of the Amorites לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying
